page.title: 08Westcliff Shops.
page.content: Most people live close to the shops. They are very handy. There is: a clothes shop, a post office, a homecare shop, a chip shop, a sweet shop, a green grocers, a shoe menders, a meat shop, a hair dressers (for men and women), a laundrette, a bakers, and a small supermarket. These shops are handy for daily shopping. In the same area there is a pub, a betting shop and a library. There is a building for the youth club, 3 telephones, a small play park and 2 car parks for shoppers. For larger shopping trips, people usually go to the large supermarket on the edge of the estate.
